segments.text: Hey daddy ! You look great today . I like your tie ! By the way , I was wondering can I ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I haven't even told you what it is yet !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay , okay , what do you want ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you think I could borrow the car ? I ’ m going to a concert tonight .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Um .. I don ’ t think so . I need the car tonight to pick up your mother .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Egg ! I told you about it last week ! Smelly Toes is playing , and Eric asked if I would go with him !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Duh ! He's like the hottest and most popular guy at school ! Come on , dad ! Please !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Fine then ! Would you mind giving me 100 bucks ?
segments.speaker: S1
